title: Best Dividend Paying High Yields
content: High Yields are stocks with a dividend yield of more than 5   Some 857 listed companies have such a high yield but not all of them have a sustainable dividend and pay the best dividends at the market  In order to find the best dividend paying growth stocks from the investment class High Yield stocks  I screened all companies with a five percent dividend yield  great earnings per share growth of more than 10  and an operating margin over 15   To get the best results in terms of low debt and high cash  the debt to equity ratio should be under 0 5    of which nine are currently recommended to buy  The best recommended stock is City Telecom HK  CTEL  with a yield of 16 47 percent and a strong buy rating CTC Media  NASDAQ  CTCM  has a market capitalization of  1 50 billion  The company employs 1 183 people  generates revenue of  766 36 million and has a net income of  60 52 million  The firm s earnings before interest  taxes  depreciation and amortization  EBITDA  amounts to  393 18 million  The EBITDA margin is 51 31 percent  operating margin 16 49  and net profit margin 7 90    Financial Analysis   The total debt represents 1 90  of the company s assets and the total debt in relation to the equity amounts to 2 45   Due to the financial situation  a return on equity of 7 14  was realized  Twelve trailing months earnings per share reached a value of  0 37  Last fiscal year  the company paid  0 82 in form of dividends to shareholders  Market Valuation   Here are the price ratios of the company  The P E ratio is 25 59  P S ratio 1 95 and P B ratio 2 14 title: U S  stocks mixed at close of trade  Dow Jones Industrial Average up 0 70
content:
Investing com   U S  stocks were mixed after the close on Friday  as gains in the Financials  Utilities and Consumer Goods sectors led shares higher while losses in the Healthcare  Consumer Services and Technology sectors led shares lower 
At the close in NYSE  the Dow Jones Industrial Average gained 0 70   while the S P 500 index lost 0 05   and the NASDAQ Composite index lost 1 01  
The best performers of the session on the Dow Jones Industrial Average were  Nike  Inc  NYSE NKE   which rose 8 89  or 10 21 points to trade at 125 00 at the close  Meanwhile  Cisco Systems Inc  NASDAQ CSCO  added 2 42  or 0 61 points to end at 26 02 and JPMorgan Chase   Co  NYSE JPM  was up 2 08  or 1 25 points to 61 47 in late trade 
The worst performers of the session were UnitedHealth Group Incorporated  NYSE UNH   which fell 3 90  or 4 72 points to trade at 116 37 at the close   Pfizer  Inc  NYSE PFE  declined 2 46  or 0 81 points to end at 31 89 and Merck   Company Inc  NYSE MRK  was down 1 96  or 0 99 points to 49 60 
The top performers on the S P 500 were Nike Inc  NYSE NKE  which rose 8 89  to 125 00  Genworth Financial Inc  NYSE GNW  which was up 4 21  to settle at 4 95 and Intercontinentalexchange Group Inc  NYSE ICE  which gained 3 67  to close at 235 00 
The worst performers were Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc  NASDAQ VRTX  which was down 7 05  to 103 28 in late trade  Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc  NASDAQ REGN  which lost 5 86  to settle at 491 43 and  Diamond Offshore  Drilling Inc  NYSE DO  which was down 5 22  to 18 34 at the close 
The top performers on the NASDAQ Composite were  Bellerophon Therapeutics Inc   NASDAQ BLPH  which rose 67 74  to 6 24   Prima BioMed Ltd   NASDAQ PBMD  which was up 16 83  to settle at 1 390 and Hong Kong Television Network Ltd  NASDAQ HKTV  which gained 14 42  to close at 4 92 
The worst performers were  Aratana Thr   NASDAQ PETX  which was down 38 97  to 10 68 in late trade   Sysorex Gbl   NASDAQ SYRX  which lost 32 50  to settle at 1 08 and Galapagos NV  NASDAQ GLPG  which was down 27 46  to 44 60 at the close 
Falling stocks outnumbered advancing ones on the New York Stock Exchange by 1465 to 1077 and 1 ended unchanged  on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange  1772 fell and 789 advanced  while 43 ended unchanged 
Shares in Nike Inc  NYSE NKE  rose to all time highs  rising 8 89  or 10 21 to 125 00  Shares in Diamond Offshore Drilling Inc  NYSE DO  fell to 5 year lows  losing 5 22  or 1 01 to 18 34  Shares in Nike Inc  NYSE NKE  rose to all time highs  rising 8 89  or 10 21 to 125 00  Shares in Merck   Company Inc  NYSE MRK  fell to 52 week lows  down 1 96  or 0 99 to 49 60  
The CBOE Volatility Index  which measures the implied volatility of S P 500 options  was down 1 36  to 23 15 
Gold for December delivery was down 0 71  or 8 20 to  1145 60 a troy ounce  Elsewhere in commodities trading  Crude oil for delivery in November rose 1 53  or 0 69 to hit  45 59 a barrel  while the November Brent oil contract rose 0 52  or 0 25 to trade at  48 42 a barrel 
EUR USD was down 0 23  to 1 1206  while USD JPY rose 0 40  to 120 55 
The US Dollar Index was up 0 22  at 96 31

title: U S  stocks lower at close of trade  Dow Jones Industrial Average down 1 11

title: U S  stocks higher at close of trade  Dow Jones Industrial Average up 0 12
